alert.note: Alert for Baxter; Boone County Except Southwest; Fulton; Marion (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 02 at 11:29PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Marion, southeastern Boone, northwestern Fulton and Baxter Counties through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1128 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles northwest of Price Place to near Lakeway to near Olvey. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mountain Home... Bull Shoals... Yellville... Gassville... Flippin... Lakeview in Baxter County... Norfork... Salesville... Briarcliff... Pyatt... Arkawana... Olvey... Ott... Lakeway... Bull Shoals State Park... Clark Hill... Herron... Colfax... Advance... Cartney... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for north central Arkansas.

area.areaDesc: Baxter; Boone County Except Southwest; Fulton; Marion
